definition: an instance of accomplishing something by scheming or trickery, achieve something by means of trickery or devious methods
details:
noun
- an instance of accomplishing something by scheming or trickery
= synonyms: wangling
verb
- achieve something by means of trickery or devious methods
= synonyms: manage, finagle
- tamper, with the purpose of deception
= synonyms: fake
